H0.text: What clothing-part metaphorically classifies workers/jobs according to white or blue. Cuff

H1.text: What clothing-part metaphorically classifies workers/jobs according to white or blue. Hem

H2.text: What clothing-part metaphorically classifies workers/jobs according to white or blue. Sleeve

H3.text: What clothing-part metaphorically classifies workers/jobs according to white or blue. Collar

A4.text: The blue collar/white collar colour scheme has socio-economic class connotations.

A5.text: The phrase stems from the image of manual workers wearing blue denim or chambray shirts as part of their uniforms.
